column1: L, Maria Bartiromo And Eric Trump Whine About Biden's Weekend Trips To Delaware, David, 03-29-21,
column2: Fox News host Maria Bartiromo on Sunday complained to Eric Trump about President Joe Biden's weekend trips to his family home in Delaware.
column3: If the Biden and Harris administration does not want to visit the border then President Trump says he will go to the border Bartiromo said during her introduction of the former president's son.
column4: Eric great to see you today she said. "It's worth noting that Biden spent this weekend in Delaware his fifth trip home since becoming president. That's his sixth weekend away from the White House. We're not even 100 days in!"
column5: I don't even know where to begin Trump replied. "It's heartbreaking to us. I saw how much time and effort my father put into the job."
column6: You know how many times my father went down to the border? he continued. "Because it's a serious issue that you know plagues this country. I mean you've seen it and you see these children and my father had the issue fixed Maria."
column7: The Fox News host failed to mention that former President Donald Trump played golf 19 times during his first 100 days.
